title: Killer View (Cindy York Mysteries Book 4)
features: It’s been four years since sometime sleuth Cindy York left the real estate world behind in favor of a more fulfilling career as a stay-at-home mom. Now that her little one is starting school, Cindy fears her life is about to become dull.She shouldn’t have worried.An old college roommate soon surfaces and begs Cindy to sell her home, making it impossible for the former agent to say no. Pamela Hilton is going through a messy divorce and any profit will need to be split between the woman and her louse of a spouse. But when Cindy shows the home to prospective buyers and Kevin Hilton is found doing a dead man’s float in their pool, trouble starts to overflow.Convinced of her friend’s innocence, Cindy sets out to find a ruthless killer. But will her return to the workforce and her life both be short term?
description: "Tessa's tight-knit extended family and kind small-business owners in Harvest Park provide warmth in this small-town cozy full of twists and red herrings and lots and lots of pasta."  -

Booklist on Penne Dreadful "A delectable combination of character, setup, and plot...There's a neat stepping-off point for the next book in the series at the end, and if it's anything like this one, I'm certainly looking forward to devouring it." -
Mystery Scene Magazine "Catherine Bruns creates characters that feel like family and touch your heart...she  always cooks up a delightful mystery!" -
Gemma Halliday, #1 Amazon and New York Times bestselling mystery author
"I laughed until I cried, and then I laughed some more!"
Fresh Fiction on Ginger Snapped to Death
"Catherine Bruns closes the deal with this fantastic cozy."
Night Owl Reviews on Killer Transaction
"Frosted with Revenge is fantastic and a worthy entry for cozy mystery fans!"
"A fast-paced whodunit that kept me entertained and was well-rounded, giving me enough of a plot to sink my teeth into."
"I started reading this book holding my breath and ended up crying at the end.....good tears, I assure you!"
"Catherine Bruns delivers another delectable page-turner in It Cannoli be Murder."C
